Methods in org.slim3.controller that return Controller
protected  Controller FrontController.createController(String path)
          Creates a new controller specified by the path.
protected  Controller FrontController.getController(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, String path)
          Returns the controller specified by the path.
 

Methods in org.slim3.controller with parameters of type Controller

          Do a forward to the path.

          Do a redirect to the path.

          Handles the navigation.
protected  void FrontController.processController(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Controller controller)
